entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning near noon then changing to a few rain showers or flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or flurries ending in the evening then clearing. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming west 20 in the evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 26 December 2022
